body.div: $Heresies detected and the detectours$ Serles saide
$Serles$ $n$ Christe was nurrished with celestiall mylke / and
John ffurner Thies personnes ar noted to be
Robert Burges Witnes of the Sermon made
John Colyer at Lenham the day of the
John Brewster Assumption of our Ladye
$Brandkirk Shether Joan MardenÂ Robert Colman$ he saied there is none in heaven but Christ only
The supper of the lord quod he
$Parkhurst; gardiner; hunt; milles$ ys not hostia pro peccatis but hostia Laudis
$Cyriack petit; William hunt; Shether$ $n$ The holly gooste is neither in this place
